title.rendered: Ben Lazenby  |  Regional MD Middle East & India | Country Manager UAE

content.rendered:
Ben Lazenby is a master mariner with 25 years’ experience in the maritime offshore industry. His specialist areas of competence are marine operations, rig moving and marine warranty. He has conducted more than 300 rig moves as Tow Master or Marine Warranty Surveyor. Mr Lazenby is based out of AqualisBraemar’s regional headquarters in Dubai, UAE and oversees the operations of the company’s other offices in the region: Abu Dhabi, UAE; Manama, Bahrain; Doha, Qatar; and Dammam, Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.

Contact

Dubai | +971 (0)56 175 7635
